Articles.Content: So for the past few days my game has been crashing with increasing frequency when I am in the Vehicle Assembly. I don't get an error screen, I just get an Oops screen and when i close it KSP crashes. Here is a .rar file containing all 12 crash reports. Dropbox Link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/8jz78m7f7emleaw/AAD3rSlkpWpzoCI378_0gC_ca?dl=0

Hi Ursi, welcome to the forum

Can you please reset then disable PrecisionX, it's been causing KSP to crash for everyone using it so far because it hooks into RAM and overclocking your GPU makes it unstable, this messes with things while KSP is running.

Edited October 10, 2015 by sal_vager
So far the fix is working! Thanks!
Hey Sal! I'm having this problem too; how do I find, reset and disable precisionX? Also my GPU is overclocked, do I need to default it in addition to altering "precisionX"?

Hi fireblade, this is PrecisionX, you probably don't have it if you're not aware of it, it's software for monitoring and overclocking the graphics card.

KSP doesn't like to be overclocked so if you could put your gfx card back to the defaults it should stop the crashes.
